H0.text: Which musical instrument can have 21, 22, or 23 strings. Harp

H1.text: Which musical instrument can have 21, 22, or 23 strings. Koto

H2.text: Which musical instrument can have 21, 22, or 23 strings. Guqin

H3.text: Which musical instrument can have 21, 22, or 23 strings. Sitar

A4.text: Variants were described, ranging from 14 to 17 strings, and the instrument was used by wandering minstrels for accompaniment.

A5.text: The guqin has a modern form stabilized to seven strings.

A6.text: A sitar can have 18, 19, 20, or 21 strings
